类的使用
data.Classroom

  • 使用Classroom的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    client  
    data  

    • client中Classroom的使用

      参数类型为Classroom的client中的构造器 
      构造器 说明
      AssignmentViewer​(Classroom classroom, Teacher teacher)  
      SelectAssignmentScreen​(Student student, Classroom classroom)
      Creates a screen that allows the user to choose a assignment to submit to
      StudentClassroomScreen​(Classroom classroom, java.lang.String key, Student s)
      Shows past submissions of the student and allows user to submit new assignments.
      SubmissionScreen​(Classroom classroom, Student student, int rubric)
      Creates a new Submission Screen to submit essay to
      TeacherSubmissionViewer​(Classroom classroom, int rubric, Teacher teacher)  

    • data中Classroom的使用

      返回变量类型为Classroom的类型的data中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Classroom> DatabaseChangeListener.getClassrooms()  
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Classroom> DatabaseModifier.getClassrooms()  
      参数类型为Classroom的data中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static void DatabaseModifier.addClassroom​(Classroom classroom)
      Adds a new classroom to the database.
      static java.lang.String DatabaseModifier.getKey​(Classroom classroom)
      If the classroom does not exist in the database, an empty String will be returned
      static void DatabaseModifier.set​(java.lang.String key, Classroom classroom)
      Updates the classroom at a particular location in the database to a new Classroom object that is passed in through the parameter.
      java.lang.String DatabaseModifier.submitClassroomToDatabase​(Classroom classroomSubmission)
      Submit classroom to Database
